C7嘅轉會好似有變化
因為佢無入選葡萄牙個名單

國際米蘭球星史基尼亞的經紀人表示，史基尼亞在國際米蘭很開心，但是現在球隊中每個人都可能被出售。

他表示：「夏季轉會市場馬上就要開始，我還沒法告訴你接下來會發生什麼。我們和國際米蘭還有4年的合同，但是全世界很多球隊都對史基尼亞感興趣，這仍然和金錢有關係。」

「如果國際米蘭考慮賣掉他，那至少也是7000萬歐元以上。史基尼亞在國際米蘭很開心，但是如果真的有頂級的邀約，我們也並不會拒絕。」

「我們還要看看最後一場比賽是什麼結果，但是足球世界裡任何事情都有可能發生，情況在不斷變化，我們已經為任何一種可能性做好了準備。」

「一名球員的價值取決於他在球場上的表現，以及他的合同期還有多久。就像我之前提到的那樣，我們和國際米蘭還有4年的合同。」

「當然，如果國際米蘭沒有獲得歐冠資格的話，事情可能會發生改變，這也取決於國際米蘭的經濟狀況，目前我對此也不是很清楚。」

quote.msg:
國際米蘭球星史基尼亞的經紀人表示，史基尼亞在國際米蘭很開心，但是現在球隊中每個人都可能被出售。

他表示：「夏季轉會市場馬上就要開始，我還沒法告訴你接下來會發生什麼。我們和國際米蘭還有4年的合同，但是全世界很多球隊都對史基尼亞感興趣，這仍然和金錢有關係。」

「如果國際米蘭考慮賣掉他，那至少也是7000萬歐元以上。史基尼亞在國際米蘭很開心，但是如果真的有頂級的邀約，我們也並不會拒絕。」

「我們還要看看最後一場比賽是什麼結果，但是足球世界裡任何事情都有可能發生，情況在不斷變化，我們已經為任何一種可能性做好了準備。」

「一名球員的價值取決於他在球場上的表現，以及他的合同期還有多久。就像我之前提到的那樣，我們和國際米蘭還有4年的合同。」

「當然，如果國際米蘭沒有獲得歐冠資格的話，事情可能會發生改變，這也取決於國際米蘭的經濟狀況，目前我對此也不是很清楚。」

米蘭達踼得最好，希望佢下年保持到九成；個個都好落力, 不惜氣力，但領隊成年都教唔識佢哋冇球走位，光頭要努力, 齋靠角球? 光頭佬的難題⋯⋯
跟巴塞協議,我地入歐聯一定要買斷R8. 佢表現可以，但佢創造力不足，這是國米長期問題，如果買一個創造性中場回來,又嘥咗佢, 蹆後一格, 又同77撞, 難題⋯⋯
其實頭60分鐘根本做唔到波上去比i9, 我相信433不太適合i9打, 啱啱買咗個前鋒都係矮仔，改4312/442要買一個高大又有二傳能力前鋒， 現今世上唔多兼且好貴，難題⋯⋯
國米中場硬度不足, G5 可以, 但冇替換, 難題⋯⋯
有難題即係有進步空間, 但要d管理層有智慧去解決, 不只是有冇錢，another 難題⋯⋯

捧咗廿年國米，先發現伊卡呢啲反骨狗做過咩都可以當冇事，仲幫佢揾晒藉口，老婆前經理人頂晒。Rano之前表現真係差，一早已經賤過地底泥，俾人借完去森多返嚟連件23號都冇埋，就快俾人踢走果陣又因爲自己隊波縮皮俾人當condom留返低，之後隊波有咩伊郁又賴晒落佢度，連呼吸都係錯
講真，Rano嘅國米生涯好令人失望係事實，不過佢從來冇講過國米壞話，可以企得返起身又任勞任怨，點都值得少少尊重呀大佬

Barca warn Inter over Rafinha

Barcelona director Ariedo Braida has urged Inter to speed up their negotiations for Rafinha. “Other clubs are interested in him.”

Rafinha joined Inter on a six-month loan from Barcelona in January and helped the Nerazzurri qualify for the Champions League, but the arrangement does not include the option of a permanent transfer for the midfielder.

“It’s possible that he’ll stay at Inter, but nothing’s been decided yet. Other clubs are interested in him,” Milan’s former general manager told Gr Parlamento.

“Rafinha’s a wonderful lad and player with very good technical skills. I think it could be useful for Inter.

“He’s managed to overcome a long spell out and he’s now ready for next season. It takes time for a deal to be struck.

“The prices of players are high and the market has changed after the Neymar affair. Rafinha is a players who knows how to do interesting thing.”

NEW PARTNERSHIP IN HONG KONG FOR INTER ACADEMY
The project will involve 200 6 to 17-year-olds and it will be coordinated by Inter Club Hong Kong President Louis Liu and Chiu Chun Kit

Inter Academy is set for an important new adventure as the development process across the world continues with a prestigious new partnership in Hong Kong as part of the wider project with Suning Group to develop football in China.

To start with, the project will involve 200 young people aged between 6 and 17 and give them the chance to train in Happy Valley and Morse Park. Management will be coordinated by Louis Liu who is the President of Inter Club Hong Kong and former Hong Kong Premier League player Chiu Chun Kit who will work as the Technical Director.

The opening event in Hong Kong which the Nerazzurri’s Vice-President Javier Zanetti will attend is scheduled for Monday 30th July.

Marcelino: “Valencia Will Redeem Kondogbia But Inter Undecided About Cancelo”

Valencia manager Marcelino has reaffirmed that the Spanish club will be taking up their option to redeem Geoffrey Kondogbia but conceded he is unsure as to what Inter will be doing with regard to keeping a hold of Joao Cancelo.

“Inter has until May 31 to exercise their purchase option for Joao Cancelo and this is also the case for us with Geoffrey Kondogbia. They [Inter] have not decided what they will do but we will make it [redeeming Kondogbia] official.”

Marcelino did not however state when Valencia will activate their option but with only eight days until d-day, an official announcement can only be around the corner.

Both Cancelo & Kondogbia have excelled at their respective loan clubs this season. Inter’s chances of keeping Cancelo seemed nothing more than a pipeline dream over a week ago but with Champions League qualification in the bag, Inter’s chances of keeping the Portuguese have certainly increased. Valencia meanwhile have long made it clear that they will pay the €25 million fee that will allow the Frenchman to keep playing his football at the Mestalla.

Skriniar: ‘Staying at Inter’

Inter centre-back Milan Skriniar assures he won’t leave the club this summer - “Milan will stay in Milan!”

The defender has been linked with the likes of Barcelona and Manchester United, and his agent caused a stir last week when he suggested his client could move on.

“I don't worry about transfer rumours,” Skriniar told ProFutbol.sk as he attended a 100th anniversary match for his former side MSK Zilina.

“The objective was to reach the Champions League with Inter. I’m happy in Milan, I’ve never played for a move away from Italy, we’ve never discussed my future.

“Milan will stay in Milan, we want to have an excellent Champions League and finish higher up in the league.”

Barcelona Say No To Loan Extension For Rafinha

Negotiations for Rafinha are beginning. Tuttosport claims that Barcelona has said no to the hypothesis of extending the loan, shattering Inter’s strategy and Mazinho, the father-agent of the Brazilian. The latter had been the spokesperson of the Nerazzurri but the Catalan Club countered his plan with justification of the midfielders excellent season finale, once he had found full fitness.

It is for this reason that Barca will grant no discounts, as they believe, they have a player of absolute quality. So, if Inter wants him, they must pay the €35 million (plus €3 million in bonuses, expected for Champions League qualification). Otherwise, Barcelona has made it clear to Mazinho that there will be no problem in finding the Brazilian another club of high level, unlike in January. The ball goes back to Suning.

Rafinha and Joao Cancelo have made a significant improvement to the squad but Inter are still bound by the settlement agreement to ensure they break-even and don’t over-spend. A loan extension would be the perfect resolution but only time will tell if Inter can get things their way or not.

近年最佳收購

Inter are looking at Roma's Radja Nainggolan and Cagliari's Nicolo Barella as their reinforcements for the Champions League next season. At a press conference just hours ago, Luciano Spalletti confirmed that they are interested in those two players: "They are both good players". They are profiles that could replace a player like Rafinha, even Spalletti admitted it, because they can't met Barcelona's buyout clause at the moment. If they were interested, they would have to wait until June 30, as Inter would collect the 40 million euro profit that was required by UEFA's FFP rules.

If Inter would open up negotiations for Barella, they would look at sending some of their young players to Cagliari. It would be simliar to last summer's transfer with Sampdoria for Skiniar and Caprari. Regarding the Belgian, Roma value Nainggolan at no less than 40 million euros and the player earns 5 million with bonus included. At lot will depend on the player's will, but Spalletti is asking Ausilio to understand the eventual possibilities to bring forth this move. There was also discussions with the agent for both players, Alessandro Beltrami, earlier today, but they only scratched the surface. It's only the initial discussions with Nainggolan and Barella as the topics

With the arrival of Lautaro Martinez sending him further down the pecking order, Inter forward Eder could be on his way to Premier League club Crystal Palace.

The 31-year-old has failed to establish himself this season after serving as a reserve to captain Mauro Icardi, and the recent addition of Martinez from Argentine club Racing has seen Eder fall further out of favour.

This has put Crystal Palace on alert, with former Nerazzurri coach Roy Hodgson keen to reinforce his attacking options and an admirer of Eder, according to CalcioNews24.com.

Inter would be ready to sell the former Sampdoria forward for €10 million and it is believed that Palace are ready to submit a formal offer.

The Eagles recovered from a disastrous start under another former Inter coach in Frank de Boer, before finishing strongly with Hodgson at the helm and securing an 11th place finish.

However, with Christian Benteke struggling for goals up front, the London club are keen to recruit a new forward and believe Eder fits the bill.

replies.msg:
The Settlement Agreement covers the four sporting seasons 2015/16, 2016/17,
2017/18 and 2018/19. For the duration of the Settlement Agreement, the Club will be
subject to on-going restrictions which have been agreed by it and which are
summarised further below.

The main objective of the Settlement Agreement is to ensure that the Club becomes
break-even compliant within the meaning of the CLFFPR at the latest in the monitoring
period 2018/19; i.e. its aggregate break-even result for the reporting periods 2016,
2017 and 2018 must be a surplus or a deficit within the acceptable deviation in
accordance with Article 63 of the CLFFPR.

意思係監管期內國米要守住Break-even
https://www.uefa.com/MultimediaFiles/Download/OfficialDocument/uefaorg/ClubFinancialControl/02/24/67/80/2246780_DOWNLOAD.pdf

BREAK-EVEN REQUIREMENT
Relevant income and expenses must be calculated and reconciled by the licensee
to the audited annual financial statements and/or underlying accounting records
and to the projected break-even information if applicable.

ANNEX X有寫何為Relevant income同expenses
有好多人以為income同expenses只係睇轉會收入與支出，但其實唔係，係計其他盈利，包括贊助及其他營運收入等，所以有D球員你見佢唔洗賣人都可以係咁掃貨，因為佢條數砌到出嚟。
https://www.uefa.com/MultimediaFiles/Download/Tech/uefaorg/General/02/26/77/91/2267791_DOWNLOAD.pdf

我理解嘅係咁，唔知係咪岩

Andrea Ranocchia’s Revenge: “Spalletti Has Made Him The Symbol Of Inter”

This is the revenge of Inter defender Andrea Ranocchia. His name was the last to be in the Uefa Champions League and it was he who gave the last push (not only emotionally) when Inter beat Lazio in Rome in the last round of the Series A where Inter secured the 4th Champions League spot.

Something that Tuttosport underlines and praises Ranocchia’s 2017/2018 season: “In an environment that was looking for a reference point, the Umbrian defender has more and more assumed a role of someone that holds the group together. Something that has erased every talk from the last pre-season of Ranocchia moving away from Inter.”

Ranocchia has always been ready to play when being called up and not even his own goal at Stadio Marassi caused a crisis. “Spalletti has elevated him to a symbol of Inter thereby eliminating any possibility of sending Ranocchia away. He is too important for the locker room, locker room that traditionally has been fighting to find the right support in order to keep the group calm.”

真藍黑手機

Eder Opens Up For A Transfer To Cagliari

Although he did quite a good job replacing Inter attacker Mauro Icardi during his injury stint around the mid-season mark, Inter’s Italian-Brazilian striker Eder has had a tough season.

His job is to come on as a substitute in order to change the game and to be honest that just did not happen a lot. Therefore Eder is most likely to leave Inter during the summer. One of the possible destinations could be Cagliari, who during the dying seconds of the 2017/2018 season managed to avoid the bottom three spots in the standings, thereby maintaining their Serie A status until next season.

Now it is time to prepare and enforce the team and thanks to good relations with Inter this could open up for Eder who might be a good option for the Cagliari attack. This according to today’s edition of Tuttosport: “He has experience and is open for the opportunity”, the attacker himself says: “Why not?”

In the meantime Eder is enjoying the sea and the beaches of Sardinia.

replies.msg:
雖然從來都無人知中共個管制實際上有幾大，但呢個係合理嘅理由，咁國米一直講緊話要平數簿、FFP唔比我地洗錢呢個理由就唔洗再拎出嚟講。
拎咗差唔多成百億錢出嚟買間球會，首個轉會窗洗咗成億歐買水貨，仲比人呃埋一大筆經理人費用，果陣時都係用冠名贊助形式投資，相安無事。當大家都expect蘇寧用同樣嘅模式運作，但係呢兩個轉會窗不斷用FFP做理由放軟手腳，講唔通喎。

史巴列堤都講咗兩次以上Promises were made and not kept。對於財政運作同中國政策，國米管理層應該清楚過我地呢啲門外漢，咁對史巴列堤，甚至乎對球迷嚟講所謂嘅promises，都係一場空話。當然可以blame on中國政策，但我會話大部分中資對足球投資都係不可靠。
同埋今年年初中共推出咗《境外投資敏感行業目錄（2018年版）》，海外球會投資都係其中一項需限制投資，萬達已經撤資馬體會，唔知蘇寧會點啦

呢幾日都係咁傳Politano
呢條友兩場都屈我地機
意媒：國米拒絕雙曼對史堅嘅報價

史巴列堤都講咗兩次以上Promises were made and not kept。對於財政運作同中國政策，國米管理層應該清楚過我地呢啲門外漢，咁對史巴列堤，甚至乎對球迷嚟講所謂嘅promises，都係一場空話。當然可以blame on中國政策，但我會話大部分中資對足球投資都係不可靠。

The Settlement Agreement covers the four sporting seasons 2015/16, 2016/17,
2017/18 and 2018/19. For the duration of the Settlement Agreement, the Club will be
subject to on-going restrictions which have been agreed by it and which are
summarised further below.

The main objective of the Settlement Agreement is to ensure that the Club becomes
break-even compliant within the meaning of the CLFFPR at the latest in the monitoring
period 2018/19; i.e. its aggregate break-even result for the reporting periods 2016,
2017 and 2018 must be a surplus or a deficit within the acceptable deviation in
accordance with Article 63 of the CLFFPR.

意思係監管期內國米要守住Break-even
https://www.uefa.com/MultimediaFiles/Download/OfficialDocument/uefaorg/ClubFinancialControl/02/24/67/80/2246780_DOWNLOAD.pdf

BREAK-EVEN REQUIREMENT
Relevant income and expenses must be calculated and reconciled by the licensee
to the audited annual financial statements and/or underlying accounting records
and to the projected break-even information if applicable.

ANNEX X有寫何為Relevant income同expenses
有好多人以為income同expenses只係睇轉會收入與支出，但其實唔係，係計其他盈利，包括贊助及其他營運收入等，所以有D球員你見佢唔洗賣人都可以係咁掃貨，因為佢條數砌到出嚟。

Inter could reportedly offer Eder to Valencia to sign Joao Cancelo on a permanent basis.

The Nerazzurri have an option to buy the Portuguese full-back before the end of this month, but they can’t afford the €35m until July 1 due to their Financial Fair Play commitments.

The Spanish side have made it clear there will be no discounts offered, but Tuttosport believes the Beneamata are ready to offer Eder in exchange to lower the cost.

The Italian international could also be part of a deal for Nicola Barella, as Luciano Spalletti has expressed a desire to sign him for his midfield.

意大利《晚郵報》爆料，祖雲達斯打算用前鋒希古恩加上5000萬歐元求購國際米蘭隊長伊卡迪，而藍黑軍團也準備傾聽這份報價。

關於斑馬軍團希望簽下伊卡迪的傳聞已經流傳了好幾天，他合同中有一個1.1億歐元的解約條款，但僅在7月1日至20日對意大利之外的球會生效。根據《晚郵報》的消息，祖記的律師正在研究與國際的這份合同，看看是否有辦法激活該條款。

如果沒有的話，祖記的報價將是5000萬歐元加上希古恩，他們對希古恩的估價是6000萬歐元，報價總額也達到了1.1億歐元。據報導，國際和伊卡迪也準備傾聽這份報價。伊卡迪的妻子兼經紀人此前還表示，他們將和國際簽訂一份新的合同，或者轉會。

儘管伊卡迪本賽季在意甲聯賽中出場34次射入29球，榮膺最佳射手(與恩莫比尼並列)，但未能入選阿根廷國家隊參加世界盃。比伊卡迪年長5歲的希古恩本賽季各項賽事則為祖記上陣50次，射入23球，他將會代表阿根廷征戰俄羅斯世界盃。

講出嚟都冇人信

At the Football Leader Award in Naples, Barcelona sporting director Ariedo Braida spoke to Premium Sport about the Rafinha negotiation. Here is his vague answer to the question concerning the Brazilian’s future.

“He is staying at Inter? It is possible. We will see.”

Certainly between Cancelo and Rafinha, the latter has a bigger chance of staying given the fact that he wants to stay and Barcelona are not in financial trouble. Thus, there is breathing room for the Catalan club to at least give Inter another season to have the player and then maybe an obligation to buy in 2019.

Inter Will Go After Dzeko If Icardi Leaves

If Chelsea are to sign Mauro Icardi, Inter will make a move for Roma forward Edin Dzeko to replace him according to Corriere dello Sport.

Chelsea are firstly focusing on the renewals of star players Eden Hazard and Thibaut Courtois but once both of the renewals are out of the way, they will look to start signing players. Icardi has a €110 million release clause in his current contract and Chelsea would be prepared to pay it once raising the funds through the sales of striking duo Alvaro Morata and Michy Batshuayi.

Should Icardi then depart the Nerazzurri for the Blues, Inter will turn their attention to Dzeko. Inter manager Luciano Spalletti has worked with the Bosnian before and knows how to get the best out of him and he is a far more achievable signing than the likes of Rodrigo or Andrea Belotti. Corriere dello Sport understand that Inter would be able to land the 32-year-old for between €35-40 million.

打死都唔好賣呀

It was a season that saw Spalletti's Inter finish the season in fourth place, making sure that they participate in next years Champions League. The Nerazzurri now thinks of the transfer market and looks for an attacking player. There are two objectives: Simone Verdi and Matteo Politano.

For the Bologna player (Simone Verdi), the negotiation is very complicated, almost that of a 'blurred goal'. Napoli has already found an agreement with the rossoblu company with which there is the agreement on the basis of 25 million, and now are just waiting on the 'yes' from the player, who is currently engaged with the Italian national team.

Inter had taken a week, before trying to speed up the deal and are therefore far behind De Laurentiis club now. The Nerazzurri had stopped at an offer of 8 million for the loan, plus 14 for the right of redemption.

The same formula proposed to Bologna for Verdi, the Nerazzurri are also trying it for the Italian winger of Sassuolo, Matteo Politano, a very welcoming profile to coach Luciano Spalletti.

Verdi is now farther away, and the Nerazzurri continue instead, to follow Matteo Politano

SKRINIAR: "NO DOUBT, I AM STAYING. FOR THIS CLUB, I WOULD SIGN LIFETIME CONTRACT."

The Slovakian defender: "With De Vrij, this team will be stronger. We must be at our best until the end."

A well-oiled machine, a true leader. Almost as if he has been here at Inter for his life time and the 23 years of age was just a registry error. This is the most striking of Milan Skriniar, a good giant who stands chest up even in front of notebooks and microphones. The shy boy of summer of 2017, the one that always replied in monosyllables said that: “Am I amongst the best in the world? That is not for me to say. I leave the judgements to you.”

Unmovable for Luciano Spalletti, making all 38 appearances in Serie A and never missing any minute, and a transfer market dream of half of Europe. It is really a magical moment but it is better to not speak about the transfer market because he does not want to hear it: “I do not care because I am fine in Milan, at Inter. The rest just does not count.”

Many consider you as one of the best defenders in the world.

“Certainly, the compliments are pleasing, it means that I am working the right way. But please, let’s not talk only about me. It would be unfair towards my teammates: we must not forget extraordinary players and people like Ranocchia and Miranda, besides all the other defenders who have always responded on the field.”

To which, Inter have also added Stefan De Vrij…

“Very good player who had an amazing season with Lazio. His performance was under everyone’s eyes. For us, it is an important signing and I cannot be anything but happy about it. No doubt, he will make his contribution to raise the level of this squad.”

You two as a defensive couple: the fans can already dream…

“They can but you do not go anywhere on your own. This is what Inter showed this past season, it is the group that makes the difference. The real added value is the team work and it has allowed us to finally reach the Champions League.”

In which, will you be playing with the shirt of Barcelona, Manchester City or Inter?

“Of course with Inter. I am staying at 100%, no doubt about it.”

Yet, the big names in Europe are not giving up…

“I do not know about the transfer market and I do not even want to talk about it. I do not know if Barcelona or other clubs want me. I will be very sincere and repeat: all of this does not interest me. In my head there is only Inter.”

What goal do you have in mind for nexts season.

“We will need to work hard to reduce the distance with Juventus, Napoli and Roma. In the past season, they were more consistent and this was our sin. We will have to give 100% from the very first day of training camp and be more consistent.”

Is the word Scudetto a bit exaggerated at this point?

“Useless to talk about it now, we are only in June. Certainly, a big club like ours can only aspire to aim for the max. We want to be up there and fight until the end. Then we will see what happens.”

And what ambition do you have for Europe?

“Same thing, we will give everything. Inter always play for the highest goals. We need to analyze what needs to be done at the right time. It was important to return to the Champions League after many years. It was everyone’s dream: the team, coach, the club and the fans.”

How do you imagine the mid-week games at the San Siro?

“Very exciting, I would say unique. It will be great to hear that music in our stadium. I cannot wait to live those evenings with our fans: they deserve Europe more than anyone.”

For Inter fans, you are the undisputed idol.

“Between me and the fans, the feeling has always been extraordinary from the start. I thank them again because they really were the 12th man on the field.”

Would you sign a lifetime contract?

“It is not impossible. I see my friend Marek Hamsik who has become a flag/symbol at Napoli. Why could it not happen to me at Inter? I am fine here. There is no reason to think about leaving."

Inter have stalled contract talks with Mauro Icardi because they are waiting for a club to meet his €110m price, claim Mediaset Premium.

Financial Fair Play issues remain a problem and the Nerazzurri have to make €50m profit by June 30 or risk sanctions.

The quickest way of securing that is to sell Icardi, who has a release clause worth €110m valid only for clubs outside Italy from July 1-15.

As this is after the FFP deadline, it means Inter are prepared to negotiate not only with sides like Real Madrid, Chelsea or Manchester United, but also Serie A rivals Juventus.

The reports continue to circulate in the Italian media over a possible exchange with Gonzalo Higuain, which would bring in €50m cash.

Inter already have a replacement for Icardi lined up, having signed Argentina sensation Lautaro Martinez from Racing Club for €25m.

Icardi’s wife and representative, Wanda Nara, said this week that they will either agree a new contract with Inter or leave the club.

It seems as if the Nerazzurri are ready to call their bluff.

Inter midfielder Marcelo Brozovic has found a role at the club, and despite talk last season of a possible departure, the Croatian is looking forward to staying in the nerazzurri shirt. He was interviewed in the paper Vecerni in his native land: "I am coming off my best season, where a was able to play the position I feel best in. There were rumors of a possible transfer to Sevilla last summer but they didn't let me go. Spalletti gave me an opportunity and I knew I had to seize it, I want to stay at Inter: I can't wait to play in the Champions Leauge. At the beginning of the season I thought that I would be better suited as the trequartista, but then against Napoli I played in front of the defense out of necessity and I discovered that is my position. With our squad and hopefully 2-3 additions to it we can overturn the table and put a stop to Juve's dominance

The love between Joao Mario and Inter has never blossomed. 45m to get him to wear the Nerazzurri's jersey, a few played games and a reduced capacity to have an incidence on games. "I'm still worth this amount though" explains the Portuguese midfielder to La Gazzetta dello Sport. "The year I arrived it was impossible to settle, for me but also for Gabigol. First Mancini, then De Boer, then Pioli... There was a lot of confusion and we couldn't have an impact".

What about now? "I wouldn't return to Inter. It's true they've reached the Champions League and I'm happy for my former teammates, but I'm sure I'd miss the needed determination to get redeemed. If I still were an Inter player once the World Cup is over, it wouldn't have sense for me to go on Spalletti's retreat. What if Juve or Milan call me? I would say no. Not because of my Inter past but because I'm not at ease in the Italian league. I'm hoping for a Premier League side call, the top regarding my characteristics. I would also like to play in La Liga though".

Barcelona does not appear willing to place a discount on Rafinha's option. On Monday there was a meeting between the player's agents and his parent club to discuss the matter of a discount to return to Inter. But Barcelona have denied the request, and will not lower the figure, given the number of matches played this season, and will not agree to another loan. Inter will not be allowed to renegotiate any of the purchase options that were agreed to in January (€35m plus €3m bonus), but can reorganize some of the details of the payments, however Inter have not requested such changes yet. Barcelona has not lowered their demands for the player, and seem unlikely to be convinced by Inter.

國米個轉會窗要喺7月先開到，所以唔洗太擔心
一定會買一隻右翼，同埋最少一隻中場。隨住Cancelo同Dalbert離隊，都應該加多個閘做後備。

RW targets:
1. Malcom (Top target)
2. Politano

MF targets:
1. Nainggolan (Top target)
2. Dembele
3. Barella

Malcom係法國波爾多右翼，冬季差啲加盟阿仙奴，而佢係今季法甲唯一一個創造超過80個入球機會，同埋80次盤扭成功嘅球員。球員標價50m，國米比唔起但好有興趣，希望搵到一個接近標價嘅交易模式，例如加球員、分期、先借後買等。

羅馬瘋狂掃貨，依加接近簽下Cristante，有可能用以取代過30歲嘅尼恩高蘭，所以國米都唔係話無機會。

拉芬拿經歷受傷後，喺國米再次得到重用，使佢願意不惜一切留喺國米。事至今天，國米仍然能夠喺呢件事上面同巴塞周旋，關鍵在於拉芬拿對國米異常地忠心。同樣嘅租借例子，簡些路則未有如此舉措，後者更加接近加盟英超球隊狼隊，所以國米同簡些路之間可以話係已經寫上句號。

如果要二揀一，我都會揀拉芬拿。
簡些路啲速度技術係幾好j，不過防守唔多掂。我每次回想返對薩斯索羅臨完場有一下好似求其後腳攔截然後俾人過咗就覺得好勞氣。

replies.msg:
